alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Montgomery County through 230 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southern Montgomery, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Pike Road, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Alabama State University, Auburn University In Montgomery, Hope Hull, Woodcrest, Mount Meigs, Snowdoun, Pinedale, Waugh, Mitylene, Carters Hill, Barachias and Cecil. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
